issue.title: [C++] Improve Parquet fuzz seed corpus
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10083](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10083). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to add more nested data to our Parquet seed corpus.
